title: Development and Application of Theme-Based Science Vocabulary Instruction Modules

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and elementary education field experience
context.additional_context: Modules designed for elementary teachers to acquire subject-specific vocabulary contextually during science classes. Strengthens application skills through real-classroom case-based content and blended (online-offline) learning.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain 500 core vocabulary terms per science subject in context-specific scenarios
Learners can design classroom activity guides utilizing acquired vocabulary
Learners can verify the field applicability of developed vocabulary modules through peer evaluation

resources: Digital Textbook Kit by Science Subject and Theme
AI Grading System for Vocabulary Assessment

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
